hero.description: From web development to business automation, we deliver innovative technology solutions with security at the core. Trusted by businesses, institutions, and individuals worldwide.

services.title: Comprehensive IT Solutions
services.subtitle: Tailored for Your Success
services.description: From custom web development to enterprise-grade security, we provide the technology foundation your business needs to thrive in the digital age.

webDev.title: Full-Stack Web Development
webDev.description: Modern, responsive websites and web applications built with cutting-edge technologies. From concept to deployment, we handle it all.

automation.title: Business Automation
automation.description: Streamline operations with intelligent workflow automation. Reduce manual tasks, increase efficiency, and scale your business effortlessly.

network.title: Network Management
network.description: Comprehensive network infrastructure management ensuring optimal performance, security, and reliability for your business operations.

payout.title: Payout Integration
payout.description: Seamless payment gateway integration for your existing websites. Secure, compliant, and optimized for maximum conversion rates.

firewall.title: Firewall Installation
firewall.description: Advanced firewall solutions to protect your digital assets. Enterprise-grade security tailored to your specific threat landscape.

server.title: Server Setup
server.description: Professional server configuration and deployment. Optimized for performance, security, and scalability with 24/7 monitoring.

services.customSolutions: Custom solutions tailored to your unique requirements

about.title: Built by Experts, Driven by Innovation
about.description: Founded with a security-first philosophy, SVINTECH combines cutting-edge technology with deep industry expertise to deliver solutions that scale with your business.
about.missionText: To empower businesses worldwide with secure, scalable, and innovative IT solutions that drive growth and competitive advantage in the digital economy.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Next Project

quote.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
